nodes.html:
In this post, I tried adding images inside my Markdown blogs.
Using Gatsby, images can be optimized for better performance.

Today I explored GraphQL inside Gatsby!
It is powerful because I can fetch only the data I want.

In this blog, I practiced creating multiple Markdown posts.
It helps me understand how Gatsby shows a list of blogs.
This is my first blog written in Markdown inside Gatsby!
